nodes.title:
Job postings are like:

"Please upload your CV as a file"

"Okay, now please type out into boxes all the things you just sent us in your CV" https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u
nodes.author: Investment Talk

localize.full_text:
招聘信息是这样的

"请将你的简历以文件形式上传"

"好的，现在请把你刚才发给我们的简历中的所有内容都打出框来 "https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u。

招聘信息是這樣的

"請將你的簡歷以文件形式上傳"

"好的，現在請把你剛纔發給我們的簡歷中的所有內容都打出框來 "https://t.co/jofOiBHG7u。

nodes.title:
The unbundling of ideas from the mental latticework of first principles leads to a network effect inside of a flywheel to operate in a decentralized cloud of scalable profits. 

Total addressable market is infinity.
nodes.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
从第一原理的精神格局中解开思想束缚，导致飞轮内部的网络效应，以分散的云端可扩展的利润运作。

总的可寻址市场是无穷大的。

從第一原理的精神格局中解開思想束縛，導致飛輪內部的網絡效應，以分散的雲端可擴展的利潤運作。

總的可尋址市場是無窮大的。

localize.full_text:
上周亿万富翁。

卖掉你的房子，然后用这笔钱去买GME!!!!。

本周的亿万富翁们。

为了风险管理的利益，可能是一个很好的主意，卖你的失败者，当他们对你不利。

賣掉你的房子，然後用這筆錢去買GME!!!!。

$AAPL $MSFT $AMZN $GOOGL

nodes.title: A week ago, the $VIX saw its 3rd largest single-day spike in history (+62%). All of that increase has been erased as of today's close with volatility moving sharply lower. https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

localize.full_text: 一周前，美元VIX指数出现了历史上第3大单日飙升（+62%）。截至今日收盘，所有的涨幅都被抹去，波动率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。
一週前，美元VIX指數出現了歷史上第3大單日飆升（+62%）。截至今日收盤，所有的漲幅都被抹去，波動率大幅走低。https://t.co/mfex1VHZXo。

nodes.title:
RT @charliebilello: The combined annual revenue of the 4 largest US companies has surpassed $1 trillion for the first time...
Apple $AAPL:…
nodes.author: Charlie Bilello

sharedContent.title:
The combined annual revenue of the 4 largest US companies has surpassed $1 trillion for the first time...
Apple $AAPL: $294 billion
Microsoft $MSFT: $153 billion
Amazon $AMZN: $386 billion
Google $GOOGL: $183 billion

That's larger than the GDP of all but 16 countries.
sharedContent.author: Charlie Bilello
